items.name: Mastery Token (Combat)
items.customDescription: Obtained by completing Combat Achievment tasks. Used to purchase Combat Mastery Upgrades in the Shop.

items.name: Attack Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: +40 Melee Attack Bonus and +5% Chance when attacking with Melee to convert a Miss into a Hit

items.name: Strength Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: +20 Flat Melee Strength Bonus +1 extra for every 0.1s Attack Interval (doubled if a 2-Handed weapon is equipped).

items.name: Defence Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: +80 All Defence Bonuses and +5% Resistance against Bosses

items.name: Ranged Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: +50% Ammo Preservation Chance and +20% Ranged Accuracy Rating

items.name: Magic Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: Rune-providing items provide 2x as many runes, and +5% Chance to ignore any Debuffs while your Attack Style is Magic

items.name: Prayer Mastery Cape
items.customDescription: -50% Prayer Point Cost and Bones are automatically buried for 5x their Prayer Point value
